DOC.brief_summary: The main purpose of this study is to examine the effect of dapagliflozin on electronic measures of heart beats in healthy males
DOC.brief_title: Effects of Single Oral Dose Dapagliflozin QT Study
DOC.criteria: Healthy males age 18 to 45 years of age, who are not currently taking any medications Normal screening results including a physical examination, laboratory tests, heart rate, blood pressure, and ECG (electronic measure of the heart) No personal or family history of significant heart problems No use of over the counter medications within 7 days of the study No use of prescription medicaiton within 1 month of the study
